alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 3:48AM CST until March 03 at 8:27AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tennessee River at Florence affecting Colbert and Lauderdale Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tennessee River AT Florence. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Alabama State Highway 20 is flooded at the underpass below U.S. Highways 43 and 72. The underpass will likely be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM CST Thursday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to 20.7 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall to 19.9 feet and begin rising again Monday evening. It will rise to 20.1 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.8 feet on 09/20/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
